content: **this pattern is free on the marlybird website** and has an ad-free pdf available **ramble and rue crossbody bum bag crochet pattern** the ramble and rue crossbody bum bag is a modern crochet accessory that blends functionality with fashion wear it your way as a bum bag belt bag or crossbody this versatile design is a satisfying project for adventurous beginners and beyond this pattern includes written instructions for the bag and adjustable strap full zipper + optional lining guidance tips for customizing fit and finish helpful photo support + video tutorials uses worsted weight yarn includes optional zipper + lining instructions video tutorials included style wear it as a crossbody shoulder bag or bum bag skill level adventurous beginner intermediate finished size approx 8 x 11 5 x 2 adjustable strap get ready to create a functional stylish piece that turns heads and holds your essentials designed by robyn chachula for marlybird com
